     "clean": "rimraf .cache output dist",
     "ffprobe": "node download_ffprobe.js",
     "build": "yarn clean && yarn ffprobe && parcel build app/index.html --no-minify --no-source-maps --public-url ./ --target electron",

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -10,9 +10,9 @@
     "start": "concurrently --kill-others \"yarn watch\" \"electron .\"",
     "clean": "rimraf .cache output dist",
     "ffprobe": "node download_ffprobe.js",
     "build": "yarn clean && yarn ffprobe && parcel build app/index.html --no-minify --no-source-maps --public-url ./ --target electron",
-    "watch": "parcel watch app/index.html --public-url ./ --target electron --ignore=db",
+    "watch": "parcel watch app/index.html app/**/*.css app/**/*.js app/**/*.tsx app/**/*.jsx --public-url ./ --target electron",
     "build-app": "yarn build && electron-builder",
     "reinstall": "rimraf node_modules && yarn"
   },
   "build": {

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "yavl-video-library",
  "description": "YAVL Yet Another Video Library, manage your collection with the minimum effort",
  "author": "VicHaunter <vichaunter@gmail.com> (https://www.vichaunter.org)",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "license": "ISC",
  "main": "main.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "start": "concurrently --kill-others \"yarn watch --ignore db\" \"electron .\"",
    "clean": "rimraf .cache output dist",
    "ffprobe": "node download_ffprobe.js",
    "build": "yarn clean && yarn ffprobe && parcel build app/index.html --no-minify --no-source-maps --public-url ./ --target electron",
    "watch": "parcel watch app/index.html --public-url ./ --target electron",
    "build-app": "yarn build && electron-builder",
    "reinstall": "rimraf node_modules && yarn"
  },
  "build": {
    "appId": "com.github.vichaunter.yavl",
    "productName": "YAVL Video Library",
    "directories": {
      "output": "output"
    },
    "files": [
      "bin/*",
      "dist/*",
      "node_modules/*",
      "main.js"
    ],
    "asarUnpack": [
      "bin/**"
    ]
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@ant-design/icons": "^4.6.2",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.23.7",
    "antd": "^5.12.5",
    "classnames": "^2.5.1",
    "concurrently": "^8.2.2",
    "ffbinaries": "^1.1.4",
    "flag-icon-css": "^3.5.0",
    "level": "^8.0.1",
    "prop-types": "^15.7.2",
    "react": "^17.0.2",
    "react-dom": "^17.0.2",
    "styled-components": "^6.1.6",
    "zustand": "^4.5.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.0.0-0",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "^7.14.5",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.23.7",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.14.5",
    "@babel/preset-react": "^7.14.5",
    "babel-eslint": "^10.1.0",
    "electron": "^13.1.2",
    "electron-builder": "^22.11.7",
    "electron-reload": "^2.0.0-alpha.1",
    "electron-reloader": "^1.2.3",
    "eslint": "^7.28.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^18.2.1",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.23.4",
    "eslint-plugin-jest": "^24.3.6",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.4.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.24.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^4.2.0",
    "jest": "^27.0.4",
    "parcel-bundler": "^1.12.5",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.13.7",
    "rimraf": "^5.0.5",
    "typescript": "^5.3.3"
  }
}
